text:
[Speaker 1] Hey! What have you been up to lately?
[Speaker 2] Not much, just reading this book, Pride and Prejudice, by Jane Austin. Its an amazing story!
[Generated Opts] Yeah, I've heard great things about it. How far into it are you?
 That sounds like a great book. What is it about?
 Wow, that sounds like a great book. Have you seen any of the movie adaptations?
